abstract: The director of “Tangerines,” on the shortlist for the foreign-language film Oscar, knew little about Estonia — and didn’t speak the language — when he started this project.
snippet: The director of “Tangerines,” on the shortlist for the foreign-language film Oscar, knew little about Estonia — and didn’t speak the language — when he started this project.

headline.main: A Georgian Competing on Estonia's Behalf
headline.print_headline: Through a Lens Darkly: Foreign Directors on Their Films
